org.openscience.cdk.io.cml
Class CMLErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.io.cml.CMLErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class CMLErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

CDK's SAX2 ErrorHandler for giving feedback on XML errors in the CML document. Output is redirected to org.openscience.cdk.tools.LoggingTool.

Author:
Egon Willighagen
Belongs to CDK module:
io
Source code:
